code: import classes from'./Counter.module.css';import{useSelector,useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{counterActions}from'../store';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Counter=()=>{const dispatch=useDispatch();const counter=useSelector(state=>state.counter);const show=useSelector(state=>state.showCounter);const incremetHandler=()=>{dispatch(counterActions.increment());};const increaseHandler=()=>{dispatch(counterActions.increase(10));};const decrementHandler=()=>{dispatch(counterActions.decrement());};const toggleCounterHandler=()=>{dispatch(counterActions.toggleCounter());};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("main",{className:classes.counter,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Redux Counter"}),show&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:classes.value,children:counter}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:decrementHandler,children:"decrement"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{onClick:increaseHandler,children:["increase by ",10]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:incremetHandler,children:"Increment"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:toggleCounterHandler,children:"Toggle Counter"})]});};export default Counter;
